title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. For example, if the report design is in $project/test, the library include should store the relative path.
OB: When including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer is storing the absolute path instead of the expected relative path.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design. The relative path should be based on the location of the report design, for instance, $project/test.
SR:
1. Open BIRT designer.
2. Create or open a report design.
3. Include a library in the report design.
4. Save the report design.
5. Verify that the library include now stores the relative path, considering the location of the report design.
